summary: Shaft is back to find the murderer of an old friend on the cold hard city streets with a little help from his new friends.
cast: Richard Roundtree|Moses Gunn|Drew Bundini Brown|Joseph Mascolo|Kathy Imrie|Wally Taylor|Julius Harris|Rosalind Miles|Joe Santos|Angelo Gnazzo|Don Blakely|Melvin Green Jr.|Thomas Anderson|Evelyn Davis|Richard Pittman|Robert Kya-Hill|Thomas Brann|Bob Jefferson|Dan Hannafin|Jimmy Hayeson|Henry Ferrentino|Frank Adonis|Kitty Jones|Gregory Reese|Marilyn Hamlin|Cihangir Gaffari|Joyce Walker|John Foster|Gordon Parks
title: Shaft vuelve a Harlem
